reviewText:
Early Access Review

After 2 hours,

Pro's
Reminded me of an Ultima

Cons
Dozens of crashes,

Dozens of insta 1 shot kills from the supposedly easy monsters (the first ones you find)

Minimap that points in the wrong direction, ie to get to the South West part of the minimap you have to run South East.

Classes don't actually mean anything because they all have access to everything.
Warriors start with normal points, Mage starts with a 5 point deficit and defender starts with a 10 point deficit, which would be fine if the classes werent actually all the same, but they are.

Laggy, by the time the game had rendered my first strike against an 'Easy' monster I was dead, time and time again.
Character generation, I dare you to cycle through the starting villages more than twice.... your screen increases brightness each time you select the next village, your FPS dropps a few extra frames, after a couple of cycles you are blinded by a white screen and getting 1 FPS and then the inevitable game implossion and freeze.

Not fun, not an ounce of it, time to move along to something more enjoyable like jamming my finger in the car door.

Merry Xmas everybody.

reviewText:
Early Access Review

I didn't get the chance to play much, but for as much as I've played I really enjoyed it and Lonath definitely has potential.

Pros:
- Classic Isometric Camera
- I personally like the GUI
- Different Classes
- House System
- PvP
- Horse and other ridable animals (the Halloween's update Demon Wolf is awesome and free)
- Decent graphics, but awesome for a classic isometric game
- No pay-to-win whatsoever
- Friendly players
- Trading
- Taming monsters!
- Being able to use magic attacks and melee attacks at the same time, you can make nice combo hits out of this feature, which in my opinion is pretty amazing because then the PvP becomes a matter of skills and not only abilites.
And several other good features...

Cons:
- Kind of empty world
- Not much to explore
- Monsters automatically attacking you at level 5 should be changed to like level 15-20 or something
- Needs more safe zones
- Economy issues, prices are a bit high for the coins rate drop
- No archery
- No female characters
- No steam login integrated
- Legend Dungeon needs less powerful monsters
And a few other cons that I don't remember at this right moment, but considering that it is still in Early Access and the developer is open to suggestions and improving the game, it really has potential.

So, I personally like the game this far and I will keep playing and suggesting stuff.
I will also try to update this review with the upcoming features/updates.

reviewText: Early Access Review\n\nThis game seems to be one of the best MMORPG's that are in a Early Access stage out there. I am not going to go in details but thus far (around 14 hours) I enjoyed every moment in the game and everyone is so friendly, even the developer. As I said, even the developer is active in the game time to time and we went hunting together, he is really friendly and considers every idea/suggestion/critique that you may have for Lonath Online. I also met other players in-game and everyone seemed to be friendly and ready to help with anything. It is a really fun game, which gives you the feeling of a classic isometric-view MMORPG but at the same time with modern features. Even though, I found a few small bugs (none of them affected the gameplay), it is still on its early stage and it really has potential! I will keep you guys updated of how it goes next.

reviewText:
Early Access Review

Lonath Online seems to me like it's a new beginning for Mmorpgs it diserve's a good basic detailed review as soon as my character was created i spawned in town and was greeted by another player i then decided hmm i wonder what happens when i chase him lol he fled into a unsafe territory passing tree's bushes and terrain i caught up with my friend" the other player then i casted some spell i forgot the name not use to everything yet but i did 27 damage on him with my sword then i ran around saw a man on a horse slowly walking towards me i was starting to get worried oh **** im on foot i cant outrun a horse lol but then i noticed i was greeted with a hello and his username was Admin  i can surely say i already feel at home with the developer greeting me and the other players in game and helping us out i can surely say this was so far a exciting experience we've already shared ideas and such and he seems to be very friendly kinded and well mannered.This game is everything i exspected at this time for $11.69 who can beat it with a top down view style camera and a point to click style pvp and pve im enjoying myself alot.


The game can literally run on almost any computer and when i mean almost the only computer that i believe that would be excluded from playing this game would be from the 70's or 80's or 90's

MINIMUM SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS
------------------------------------------------------------
OS: XP
Processor: 2.0 Ghz Dual-Core
Memory: 2 GB RAM
Graphics: 256MB
Hard Drive: 300 MB available space



Warrior Class
----------
Warriors deal alot of damage with weapons and various weapons with different attack rates i like warriors for my first class seams easiest to play not saying any other class is harder but just saying i prefer a easier class to play in the beginning if your going with warrior go with a dagger in the beginning until you level up your strength more.Warrior combat is hack and slash type gameplay point to click and attack daggers can attack once every second unlike some other weapons just choose what feels right for you its all up to you.


Magic Class
---------
Magic is similar to Ulima online and diablo which is neat theres already quite a few spells to use you just need the required mana level to cast certain ones i can already say that the pvp is going to be intense.


Defenders Class
--------------------------
Very tanky you grow defense levels quicker and you can withstand more damage overal the class tank you can play any class you want and you can use any weapons you want your not limited to your class type weapons im a warrior and i was weilding a staff and torch for magic bonus mage gear seems to be good

Overall all the classes seem to be fairly balanced i hope this stays like this throughout the development of this title

User controls

Right mouse button-Move around
Shift-Run
Left mouse button-Click to attack or interact with enemys or other players
Dragable items to place in your character gear screen such as equipment rings knecklaces armours etc..
To pick up items simply move your mouse cursor over the selected item and click take for gold all you have to do to pick it up is simply walk over it and it will automatically be added to your inventory


I'll update my review as i play more

i rate this game as of right now 12/10
What do you have to loose you can barley get a meal at any restaurant for $11.69 take the chance its worth it i have high hopes for this game the developer seems to really care about how you feel about his game.Dont hesitate to suggest any idea's or suggestions.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 Star for open world pvp with safe zones more safe zones comming
1 Star for Top down camera/Point to click gameplay
1 Star for mounts Mounted Combat and in game house buildings excited to see where this goes :D
1 Star for Cosmetic Item Shop not pay to win which is cool! unique cosmetic skins comming soon
1 Star for Spells any class can cast spells and gain any skill basically you can become a hybrid
1 Star for character customization basic but yet still cool to look different
1 Star for the Indie Developer being so friendly kinded and well mannered he obviously cares about his community and how to make his game better
1 Star for reading my suggestions and actually thinking about implementing some of my ideas/suggestions
1 Stars for crafting comming in game words from the developer woot
2 Stars for Archery comming in game words from the developer :D!
1 star for polymorphing ability from scrolls that drop from mobs allows you to turn into a certain type of monster depending on where you obtained your scroll.
2 Stars for being able to tame monsters
1 star for being able to trade others in game

Oh yea after 5 hours of playing i finally found myself a treasure map gonna go find the loot soon.Wish me luck :D


Overal this game has little to no known bug's and its initial gameplay is fun and exciting you actually have to put effort into fighting there is a skill bar with various spells you can cast all classes can cast any spell depending on there magic level or gear there wearing
date: certain gears give better bonuses not all gear is the same\n\n5/5 stars for my first time ingame experience :D"
